1.content: ### Which types of issues happen most frequently?

4.content: ### How long does it take us to resolve issues?

5.title: Top 20 Problems by Event
5.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize {problemCount = countDistinct(event.id), by:{event.name}}
| sort problemCount desc
| limit 20

6.title: Median Problem Resolution Time
6.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=median(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m)}
| fieldsAdd  minutes_to_resolve, alias: `Median Minutes to Resolve`
| fieldsRemove minutes_to_resolve

7.title: Median Problem Resolution Time in Minutes
7.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=median(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m)}
| summarize median(minutes_to_resolve), alias:`MTTR`

8.content: ### Which problem types take the longest to resolve?

9.title: Median Problem Resolution Time by Event Name
9.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=median(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m), event.name}
| sort event.name desc

10.title: Median Problem Resolution Time by Event Name in Minutes

12.title: Most Common Slowdown & Error Root Causes
12.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (event.category == "SLOWDOWN" OR event.category == "ERROR") 
| filterOut isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| summarize count=count(), by:{root_cause_entity_id, root_cause_entity_name}
| sort count desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=count, root_cause_entity_id

13.content: ### Median Time to Restore Service (Problem Resolution Time) over Time

14.title: Median Problem Resolution (Last 7 days)

15.title: Median Problem Resolution (Last 30 days)

16.title: Median Problem Resolution by Event Name (Last 7 days)
16.query:
fetch events, from:now()-7d
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=median(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1h), event.name}
| fieldsAdd  minutes_to_resolve, alias: `Median Minutes to Resolve`
| fieldsRemove minutes_to_resolve

18.title: Top 40 Problem Count by Event

19.title: AVG Problem Resolution Time in Minutes
19.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize minutes_to_resolve=avg(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m)}
| summarize avg(minutes_to_resolve), alias:`ATTR`

20.title: AVG Problem Resolution Time by Event Name in Minutes

21.content: ### AVG Time to Restore Service (Problem Resolution Time) over Time

22.title: AVG Problem Resolution (Last 7 days)

23.title: AVG Problem Resolution by Event Name (Last 7 days)

24.title: AVG Problem Resolution (Last 30 days)

25.title: Most Common Resource Contention Root Causes
25.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (event.category == "RESOURCE_CONTENTION")
| filterOUT isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| summarize count=count(), by:{root_cause_entity_id, root_cause_entity_name}
| sort count desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=count, root_cause_entity_id

27.title: Most Common Availability Root Causes
27.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (event.category == "AVAILABILITY")
| filterOUT isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| summarize count=count(), by:{root_cause_entity_id, root_cause_entity_name}
| sort count desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=count, root_cause_entity_id

38.title: Problematic Entities
38.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and isNotNull(root_cause_entity_name)
| expand root_cause_entity_name
| expand root_cause_entity_id
| summarize problemCount=countDistinct(event.id), by: {root_cause_entity_id, root_cause_entity_name}
| sort problemCount desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=problemCount, root_cause_entity_id

39.title: Affected Entities
39.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| summarize problemCount=countDistinct(event.id), by: {entityId}
| sort problemCount desc
| fields entityId, Count=problemCount

41.title: Average Problem Resolution (Forecast)
41.query:
fetch events, from:now()-30d
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| makeTimeseries `AVG Minutes to Resolve`=avg(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000)

dt.statistics.ui.ForecastAnalyzer.query:
fetch events, from:now()-30d
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| makeTimeseries `AVG Minutes to Resolve`=avg(toDouble(resolved_problem_duration)/60000)
